body_html:
By removing mkl and everything that depends on it (should be handled by conda) and installing nomkl instead, I could prevent the error from occuring. I am not sure about any performance consequences since my dataset is rather small.
See here: conda/conda#2032
Worked for me.

body:
By removing mkl and everything that depends on it (should be handled by conda) and installing nomkl instead, I could prevent the error from occuring. I am not sure about any performance consequences since my dataset is rather small.
See here: https://github.com/conda/conda/issues/2032
Worked for me.
